thread.title: Facebook shares slide after reports of data misuse

title: Facebook shares slide after reports of data misuse
text:
Facebook shares slide after reports of data misuse 11:12am EDT - 01:50 
Facebook shares have fallen around five per cent after media reports that a political consultancy that worked on President Trump's campaign gained inappropriate access to data on 50 million Facebook users. Sonia Legg reports ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Facebook shares have fallen around five per cent after media reports that a political consultancy that worked on President Trump's campaign gained inappropriate access to data on 50 million Facebook users. Sonia Legg reports Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2pp5WW8
